parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: weight of the backend, must be between 1 and 100, default is 8

operations.description: Set the weight of a backend. For instance, if backend A has a weight of 8 and backup B was a weight of 16, backend B will receive twice more connections as backend A. Backends must be on the same POP for the weight parameter to take effect between them.
